module.name: physical_unit_non_planar_design_view
module.keywords: module, design, manifold surface, subsurface, physical design

purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of manifold subsurface shapes of components in an assembly.
This second edition of this part of ISO 10303 incorporates the modifications to the first edition listed below.
The following ARM EXPRESS declarations and interface specifications have been modified:

inscope.li: assembly components with non-planar shape models that are sub-models of the shape of the assembly;
items within the scope of application module Manifold subsurface, ISO/TS 10303-1702;
items within the scope of application module Physical unit design view, ISO/TS 10303-1728.

ae.refpath: manifold_subsurface_shape_representation <= shape_representation <= representation {representation [representation.id = 'acnpsm'] [{representation.context_of_items -> representation_context => geometric_representation_context geometric_representation_context.coordinate_space_dimension = 3}] [representation.description = 'acnpsm']} representation <- property_definition_representation.used_representation property_definition_representation {property_definition_representation => shape_definition_representation} property_definition_representation.definition -> property_definition => product_definition_shape => assembly_component

aa.refpath: manifold_subsurface_shape_representation <= shape_representation <= representation <- property_definition_representation.used_representation property_definition_representation {property_definition_representation => shape_definition_representation} property_definition_representation.definition -> property_definition => product_definition_shape => assembly_component
